strengths.detail: Excellent structured data: Organization, WebSite, BreadcrumbList, CollectionPage, FAQPage schemas all implemented in Liquid snippets
Product titles are well-optimized with keywords (e.g., 'Chicken Wrapped Pumpkin Dog Treats | High Protein Gut Health | CareK9')
Proper canonical and hreflang tags in theme.liquid
Dynamic meta descriptions using page_description with shop.description fallback
Uses font-display: swap for web fonts, good for CLS

issues.detail: Homepage title is just 'CareK9' - missing keywords like 'Premium Dog Treats' or 'Natural Pet Wellness'
issues.recommendation: Change to: 'CareK9 | Premium Natural Dog Treats & Pet Wellness Products'

issues.detail: 81% of traffic is Direct, only 16% Organic Search. Very low organic discovery.
issues.recommendation: Implement content marketing strategy: blog posts targeting 'healthy dog treats', 'natural dog food toppers', 'dog paw care' keywords

issues.detail: 71% bounce rate overall. About-us page has 100% bounce rate. Most landing pages except homepage have 100% bounce.
issues.recommendation: Add internal links, related products, and CTAs on all pages. Improve above-the-fold content.

issues.detail: /collections page renders almost no content - only footer payment methods visible
issues.recommendation: Add collection descriptions, featured products, and SEO content to the collections listing page

issues.detail: No blog or content marketing found. Missing huge opportunity for long-tail keyword targeting.
issues.recommendation: Create blog with articles: 'Best Dog Treats for Sensitive Stomachs', 'Benefits of Pumpkin for Dogs', 'How to Choose Healthy Dog Treats'

issues.detail: Collection titles use format 'Dog Treats â€“ CareK9' with em dash, inconsistent with product pages using pipe separator
issues.recommendation: Standardize separator to pipe (|) across all pages for brand consistency

issues.detail: Only 314 pageviews in 30 days across 80 users (3.9 pages/user). Homepage dominates with 52% of all views.
issues.recommendation: Improve internal linking and navigation. Add 'You may also like' sections on product pages.

issues.detail: Image gallery on homepage shows 5 identical product entries - likely missing diverse product showcase
issues.recommendation: Diversify homepage featured products. Ensure all images have descriptive alt text.

issues.detail: Two URLs for chicken pumpkin treats: /products/chicken-wrapped-pumpkin AND /products/chicken-wrapped-pumpkin-healthy-dog-treats
issues.recommendation: 301 redirect the shorter URL to the canonical longer one with keywords

issues.detail: qrcodes.pro referral detected - ensure QR codes point to trackable URLs with UTM parameters
issues.recommendation: Add UTM parameters to all QR code URLs for better attribution tracking

priorityActions: 1. Fix homepage title tag to include primary keywords
2. Start a blog with 2-4 SEO-optimized articles per month
3. Fix /collections page to show actual collection content
4. Add related products and internal links to reduce bounce rate
5. Create Google Search Console property and submit sitemap
6. Set up social media profiles (Instagram, TikTok) for pet niche
8. Add customer reviews/testimonials for social proof and review schema
